bibl.title: Diocletian's Birthday and Date of Accession: P. Mich. inv. 5298a Reconsidered.
bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 5298a [ed.: P.J. SIJPESTEIJN, Known and Unknown Officials, ZPE 106 (1995) pp. 229-230 et pl. Xa]. Receipt issued by an opiniator for the payment of donatives due to a particular unit of soldiers. Karanis, early part of 301. Reconstruction, translation and notes.
THOMAS J. David, Diocletian's Birthday and Date of Accession: P. Mich. inv. 5298a Reconsidered.
